Example

Confirm the result obtained for the triangular wave, function 7 in the last Task, by finding the Fourier series fully. The function involved is

\[\begin{align*} f(t) & = |t| \quad\quad - \pi < t < \pi, \\ f(t+2\pi) & = f(t). \end{align*}\]

Solution

Since \(f(t)\) is even we can say immediately \[b_n=0\qquad n=1,2,3,\ldots\] Also \[\begin{aligned} a_n=\frac{2}{\pi}\int_0^\pi t\cos nt \, dt=\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}0&&n\ \text{even}\\ \\ -\frac{4}{n^2\pi}&&n\ \text{odd}\end{array}\right. \end{aligned}\] (after integration by parts). Also \(a_0=\frac{2}{\pi}\displaystyle\int_0^\pi t\ d t=\pi\) so the Fourier series is \[f(t)=\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{4}{\pi}\left(\cos t+\frac{1}{9}\cos 3t+\frac{1}{25}\cos 5t+\ldots \right)\]
